https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cwGCWI7y2LytX2u9GCB76HCh7bn.jpg A married man in his fifties who has lost all interest in his wife suddenly meets Juliette, a young woman. She reignites love in his life but triggers violent arguments with his wife. Their indifference soon turns into chaos. (French with English subtitles) Do Me Love
